3rd Party Synd. Remarks: NEW CUSTOM 4 BDRM/3 BATH HOME IN FABULOUS EAST SACRAMENTO! This home is beautifully appointed throughout with designer tile, alder shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, wood floors, chef grade appliances, and timeless fixtures. Large kitchen with eating bar island, lots of storage, and a luxurious pantry with prep sink. The light dining area overlooks the green backyard and patio. Spacious living room with a beautiful wood panel fireplace wall as the focal point, along with panoramic glass doors leading to the covered patio, perfect for summer entertaining offering the perfect flow for indoor - outdoor living. Downstairs en-suite bedroom makes for a convenient guest quarter or a home office. The airy primary suite offers cathedral ceiling, two walk in closets and a spacious bathroom w double sinks and large shower. Secondary bedrooms features barn door and cathedral ceiling. Upstairs laundry room with cabinets and folding counter. 2 car garage and 2 off street parking spots. Walk or bike to all that East Sac has to offer! Selland's, McKinley Park, East Portal Park, and lots of eateries and cute stores. Your dream home awaits you!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 1107 47th St, a stunning two-story home located in the prestigious Fab 40's of East Sacramento. This exquisite residence, with interior design by Colossus Manufacturing, features 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms within 3,005 sq ft of meticulously maintained living space. The open floor plan, enhanced by newly redone hardwood floors and new doors, allows for an abundance of natural light throughout. The living room's coffered ceilings with backlighting create a warm and inviting atmosphere, while the updated kitchen is equipped with a built-in KitchenAid fridge, stainless steel appliances, and a gas range. The elegant dining room and luxurious custom bathrooms further add to the home's charm. The completely remodeled backyard features a fully fenced pool, a courtyard with a fireplace, and a charming guest houseperfect for visitors or potential rental income. Additional highlights include new doors and drawers, a new pantry, new french doors, built-in cabinets in the family room, and updated lighting fixtures throughout. Don't miss the opportunity to own this remarkable home in one of Sacramento's most coveted neighborhoods.
Confidential Remarks: Fireplaces convey as is. Security cameras, projector, projector screen, TVs & TV mounts, pool robot, bedside mounted lights in both primary and guest rooms, and water dispenser on counter do NOT convey. All offers should be sent to kim@houserealestate.com and tim@houserealestate.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Unassuming from the curb, yet well appointed throughout, this home was completely remodelled in 2019 by IKON homes. High quality finishes and details throughout this open concept home blends modern amenities with the charm you expect in East Sac. Kitchen, bathrooms and laundry room feature custom cabinetry, carrara marble-look quartz counters and upgraded hardware. Living room is centered by a beautiful custom mantle and built-in cabinets and shelves surrounding the cozy gas fireplace. Hardwood floors, custom window treatments and light fixtures by Cedar & Moss throughout the home add to the pleasing and high quality aesthetic. Oversized primary suite with walk-in closet, soaking tub, oversized glass surround shower and Smith & Noble window treatments. Backyard retreat features a resort-style pool and spa built in 2022 by Premier Pools. Newer presidential roof, HVAC system and dual pane windows. Be prepared to fall in love with all East Sac offers.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this exquisite property nestled in the heart of sought-after East Sacramento. Boasting 4 bedrooms with the possibility of a 5th, this home offers generous space for all. The thoughtfully designed layout includes an office with built-in desks and shelving, perfect for those who work or study from home. The master suite is a true sanctuary, featuring a huge walk-in closet that will easily accommodate your wardrobe needs. The master bathroom is equally impressive, boasting a separate bath tub and shower stall, creating an oasis of relaxation. The allure of this property doesn't end indoors - venture into the backyard and discover an entertainer's dream come true. Unwind and create lasting memories in the outdoor living space, complete with a built-in BBQ, above-ground spa, and fire pit area. A detached 2-car garage, ensures both secure parking and additional storage space. The property also includes an owned solar system with battery backup and built-in electric car charger.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Be prepared to embrace the ultimate calm that comes with entering 4812 I Street. Thoughtfully chosen coastal paint colors, window placement and garden adornments create a serene & private environment. You'll be welcomed into a spacious living & dining room featuring hardwood floors, a fireplace with a gas starter and picture window. They wrap around to the generously sized eat-in kitchen where natural light whispers in from every corner, extra-deep countertops offer the ideal space for baking and home-made pasta making, and storage is abundant with pull-outs and an organized pantry. Two bedrooms flank the North side of the home. The back bedroom was expanded at one time making it larger than you might anticipate. It hosts a sliding door leading to the backyard. A third bedroom was modified to an office to serve your home-office needs or can be easily converted back to a bedroom. The backyard is a true oasis! The back covered patio features gas plumbing for a bbq, raised garden beds await your green thumb and Spring plantings and the fountain provides the most soothing backdrop as you tend the garden, entertain friends, or curl up with a favorite book. Cul-de-sac living is magic with spontaneous opportunities for neighborhood gatherings, children playing & tucked-in privacy.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fall in love with the quintessential charm of this brick Tudor in the heart of East Sac! Timeless details like antique crystal doorknobs, leaded-glass windows, swing door and lath-and-plaster walls complement a host of thoughtful upgrades for a picture-perfect design. Fully remodeled kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, eco-friendly recycled glass counter tops, island, breakfast nook & whimsical checkered Marmoleum floor. The crown jewel is a detached guest cottage with additional 380sf of open, light-filled living space with soaring ceilings, full bath with beautiful shower enclosure and 90sf of dedicated storage behind the studio. Back yard features a generous, open patio with herringbone pavers, several varieties of fruit trees, garden beds and a darling hen house. Don't miss the expansive side yard and the finished basement, providing additional living space as a home office or cozy den/family room. Permitted upgrades include 200 amp electrical panel, kitchen remodel, guest cottage, roof/gutters and HVAC with new ducting. Blocks to all the best of East Sac - Corti Bros, Trader Joe's, Phoebe Hearst, East Portal Park, transit, eateries & coffee shops. Come see...
Confidential Remarks: Please text Stephanie at (916) 342-2288 prior to showing and doublecheck the guest cottage and main house are locked front and back when leaving.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to the charming neighborhood of East Sacramento, where this Spanish-style gem awaits! Boasting a delightful blend of traditional architecture and modern conveniences, this 3-bedroom residence offers a unique touch of elegance. Wood floors, granite throughout, custom bathrooms with glass enclosed shower, Bertazonni gas range, Bosch oven and microwave.Each bedroom is fitted with custom closets, ensuring organized living spaces. Throughout the house, shutters exude a timeless appeal.The low maintenance landscaping ensures more time for relaxation, while the captivating courtyard features a tranquil water feature and exquisite Spanish hand tile work. Summer days will be a breeze with the inviting swimming pool and outdoor kitchen, complete with a griddle, gas BBQ, refrigerator, sink, and convenient pullout trashcan. The garage is a car or motorcycle enthusiast's dream, equipped with custom cabinets, work benches, and a 220-Volt outlet for car charging. Additional parking spaces on the side street offer convenience for guests. Don't miss the opportunity to make this East Sacramento treasure your own!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: * East Sac charm meets classic Spanish Style * This home's character is captured through beautiful details like original hardwood floors with inlays, curved ceilings, and built-in cabinetry. Entering into the living room, the large picture window brings an abundance of natural light as you walk through the archway into the dining room. The updated kitchen features new countertops, new sink with dedicated hot water faucet, subway tile backsplash and Smeg appliances (including double ovens). The hall bathroom has been updated with a new tile surround, fixtures, and vanity. Each of the bedrooms is ample sized with the master suite featuring a walk-in closet and outside access. Enjoy a drink outside in your private backyard oasis complete with pool, a rare find in East Sac. The pool is solar heated and surrounded by stamped concrete with a garden and two car garage nearby. Don't forget the quarter basement; great for storage! Truly a great home on a tree-lined street in the heart of East Sac!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Make this charming 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home yours! Located on a large lot in the middle of the block in highly sought after East Sacramento, this delightful 940 sq. ft. home, built in 1927, offers tons of vintage charm. Step inside to find a bright and airy living space with original hardwood floors and a cozy fireplace. However, if you are seeking room to grow, this property also has plenty of space to expand. This spacious lot (6,000 sq. ft.) is the perfect canvas to build your dream living space and backyard upon. With many nearby restaurants, parks, shops, and hospitals (Mercy/Sutter/UCD), this charming house is the perfect place to call home or expand it and make it your own!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in East Sacramento and walking distance to fine dining, coffee roasters, wine tasting, and every possible convenience. This home has an additional 500 sq/ft ADU and has been completely remodeled and turned into a modern farmhouse retreat with French country flare. The curb appeal is just the beginning. The oversized living/family room with high vaulted ceiling welcome you into this custom home. As you walk toward the open concept kitchen with extra large island, picture how your next family gathering is going to allow everyone to participate and enjoy the occasion. Custom all wood cabinetry, quartz counters, hardwood floors throughout. Custom designed tile made and delivered from artisans in Italy and Spain. One of a kind custom ceiling fan in family room harmonizes with the stacked stone fireplace. Energy efficient commercial appliances, tankless water heater, duel fuel range, dual pane Milgard windows throughout, barn doors, clawfoot soaker tub in master suite, custom built closet organizers in each room. The list is too long to complete. Once you see the house, step out back and see the brand new ADU. With a full kitchen and bathroom as well as large bedroom and private entrance. Come see it today!
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show. Please call listing agent to set appointment. Allow 30 minutes.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Architect's Own Brick Tudor in the heart of East Sacramento. When the home was purchased 35 years ago, the owner's vision was to maximize the potential to expand while respecting the character and charm we've come to love about East Sac. The downstairs is reminiscent of your classic Tudor: original hardwood floors, cozy family room with fireplace, custom cabinetry and formal dining room. Natural light radiates from a sunroom, a great place to enjoy a book or children's play area. The open galley kitchen is complete with breakfast nook, pantry, and Spanish tile floors. The two downstairs bedrooms are spacious and perfect for an office or guest bedroom(s). It's the upstairs that transforms this classic into a truly spectacular home. The skylights and architectural design allows for a brightness and elegance seldom felt on a second level. Featuring 3 more bedrooms, all with custom storage cabinetry. The large bathroom features Carrara marble, dual shower heads, makeup vanity and double sinks. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a tree-lined East Sac street, this beautiful single-story 3 or 4 bedroom, 2 bath home sits up high looking out over the neighborhood. Elegant living and dining rooms make entertaining easy and comfortable, while the large custom kitchen offers plenty of storage. The spacious bedrooms provide so many options. A large primary suite with two closets, one with a set of built-ins and fireplace ideal for a second living area and another boasts a built-in desk and office set up plus a murphy bed. And don't forget the almost 300 square feet of finished basement. Enjoy an evening meal on the main covered tile patio and a casual cup of coffee in the morning on the side patio. 2 fountains, a 2-car attached garage, a whole house fan, a newer HVAC system, hardwood floors, tons of storage, plantation shutters, and a large indoor laundry room are just some of the many features of this amazing property. Enjoy being close to parks, restaurants, shops and so much more.
Confidential Remarks: Front door handle can lock on own. Please watch steps in entry way. Various sqft numbers available. Seller is using measurement from appraisal when purchased (attached to mls). Basement sqft not included in main sqft. Buyer to satisfy themselves to sqft count. Property tax assessment based on larger sqft count. Possible 4th bedroom is front office/den with built ins and murphy bed, but does not have a closet. Current disclosures, reports, and reports/disclosures from 2015 purchase available.
